DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
This card can be upgraded any number of times.
Downgrading a card undoes the effects of any Upgrades that have been applied to it.
Whenever you take Attack damage, reduce the damage by 25% and lose 1 Web.
Paralyzed enemies attack #b1 less time when multi-attacking.
Increases damage taken from attacks. Reduced by half each turn.
#yPotion NL Deal 10 damage to an enemy.
#yPotion NL Deal 20 damage to an enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.
#yPotion NL Deal 25 damage to ALL enemies.
